author: boisvert
msg: ODE-425: SimpleScheduler recovery is O(n) with respect to outstanding jobs

author: boisvert
msg: ODE-424: SimpleScheduler creates duplicate jobs when job execution fails

author: olegk
msg: Split ContentEntity interface into ContentEntity exposed to the consumer and ManagedContentEntity managed by a Droid. ManagedContentEntity provides an additional method to release underlying resources held by the entity such as temp files

author: markt
msg: Add lookaheads to EL parsing to prevent ambiguity,
The code generated was updated from javacc 4.0 to 4.1
AL2 headers were not added to the auto-generated files to simplify future code generation
